line-9: Our passengers and freight users are at the heart of everything we do.Â  We help connect people to their friends and families and get goods to their destination safely and efficiently.Â  Weï¿½re an organisation where people matter. In October 2023, Network Rail and Southeastern entered into an Alliance, an exciting and significant milestone that allows us to build on our strong foundations and further deepen our close working relationships, improving the passenger experience, whilst delivering value for the taxpayer and driving revenue recovery and innovation. The Joint Network Delivery Director is an exciting new role that has been created through our new Alliance, and will lead the joint Network Rail and Southeastern control team at our Kent Integrated Control Centre (KICC) in London Blackfriars. You will be responsible for the delivery of excellent train performance and passenger experience, through some of the busiest railway corridors in the world, working hand in glove with Southeastern as well as closely with our other main passenger operators (Govia Thameslink Railway and Arriva Rail London) and supporting key routes for critical freight traffic on Kent Route, including supporting the supply of over 60% of aviation fuel to Heathrow Airport. You will be working with and leading a very dedicated and talented team of over 130 people (Network Rail and Southeastern combined), to deliver a right time railway that meets defined safety, performance and financial objectives. The area managed by the KICC covers c. 1,144 miles of track, and operates over 2,200 trains a day. As an individual you will need to demonstrate strong leadership, collaboration and stakeholder management.Â  Through visible leadership you will need to continuously inspire your team to deliver better each day and drive both tactical and strategic improvements within the control. Â Through this, you will be able to play your part in delivering the joint purpose of the alliance ï¿½to work together to secure a thriving future for our railway and communities we serveï¿½.
